developmentJourney.title: Development Journey
developmentJourney.metroLine: Metro Line 1: Ben Thanh - Suoi Tien
developmentJourney.paragraph1: Ho Chi Minh City Metro construction began in 2012, with the desire to create a modern public transportation system, connecting key areas of the city.
developmentJourney.paragraph2: After more than a decade of development, we are proud to be an important part of Ho Chi Minh City's urban transportation system, providing citizens with safe, fast and convenient trips.
developmentJourney.paragraph3: With a commitment to continuous improvement and development, Metro HCM will continue to expand the network, applying advanced technology to better serve the transportation needs of city residents.
